patthana14.19:1.1.pli: Saññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nosaññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… ganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nogantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… oghaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… yogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noyogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nonīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.19:2.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.

patthana14.2:1.1.pli: Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana14.2:2.1.pli: Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Ahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana14.2:3.1.pli: Sahetukañca ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukañca ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukañca ahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasahetuko ca naahetuko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.2:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana14.20:1.1.pli: Parāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noparāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana14.20:2.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Āsavagocchakasadisaṃ.)

patthana14.21:1.1.pli: Sārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana14.21:2.1.pli: Anārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana14.21:3.1.pli: Sārammaṇañca anārammaṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.21:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana14.22:1.1.pli: Cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.

patthana14.22:2.1.pli: Nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana14.22:3.1.pli: Cittañca nocittañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṅkhittaṃ. Sabbattha pañca.)

patthana14.23:1.1.pli: Cetasikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.

patthana14.23:2.1.pli: Cittasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….

patthana14.23:3.1.pli: Cittasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasaṃsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.23:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha, purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.

patthana14.23:5.1.pli: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.23:6.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.

patthana14.23:7.1.pli: Cittasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nacittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.23:8.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.

patthana14.23:9.1.pli: Ajjhattikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana14.23:10.1.pli: Bāhiraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana14.23:11.1.pli: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.23:12.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.

patthana14.23:13.1.pli: Upādā dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana14.23:14.1.pli: Noupādā dhammaṃ paṭicca nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana14.23:15.1.pli: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.23:16.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana14.23:17.1.pli: Upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana14.23:18.1.pli: Anupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana14.23:19.1.pli: Upādinnañca anupādinnañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.23:20.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṃ …pe… āsevane ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana14.24:1.1.pli: Upādānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.24:2.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.

patthana14.25:1.1.pli: Kilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.25:2.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.

patthana14.26:1.1.pli: Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Dassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo ca nanadassanena pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana14.26:2.1.pli: Nadassanena pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana14.26:3.1.pli: Dassanena pahātabbañca nadassanena pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.26:4.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana14.27:1.1.pli: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana14.27:2.1.pli: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana14.27:3.1.pli: Bhāvanāya pahātabbañca nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana14.27:4.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana14.28:1.1.pli: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.28:2.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.

patthana14.29:1.1.pli: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.29:2.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.

patthana14.3:1.1.pli: Hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana14.3:2.1.pli: Hetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana14.3:3.1.pli: Hetusampayuttañca hetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetusampayuttañca hetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetusampayuttañca hetuvippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetusampayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.3:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana14.30:1.1.pli: Savitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana14.30:2.1.pli: Avitakkaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.30:3.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.

patthana14.30:4.1.pli: Savicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana14.30:5.1.pli: Avicāraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.30:6.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.

patthana14.31:1.1.pli: Sappītikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana14.31:2.1.pli: Appītikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappītiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana14.31:3.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.

patthana14.31:4.1.pli: Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana14.31:5.1.pli: Napītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanapītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.31:6.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.

patthana14.31:7.1.pli: Sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana14.31:8.1.pli: Nasukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.31:9.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.

patthana14.31:10.1.pli: Upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana14.31:11.1.pli: Naupekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanaupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.31:12.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.

patthana14.32:1.1.pli: Kāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana14.32:2.1.pli: Nakāmāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanakāmāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.32:3.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava.

patthana14.32:4.1.pli: Rūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca narūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana14.32:5.1.pli: Narūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.32:6.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava.

patthana14.32:7.1.pli: Arūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana14.32:8.1.pli: Naarūpāvacaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanaarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana14.32:9.1.pli: Arūpāvacarañca naarūpāvacarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.32:10.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke dve …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana14.33:1.1.pli: Pariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naapariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana14.33:2.1.pli: Apariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naapariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Apariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Apariyāpannaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napariyāpanno ca naapariyāpanno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana14.33:3.1.pli: Pariyāpannañca apariyāpannañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naapariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.33:4.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana14.34:1.1.pli: Niyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana14.34:2.1.pli: Aniyyānikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana14.34:3.1.pli: Niyyānikañca aniyyānikañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.34:4.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana14.35:1.1.pli: Niyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana14.35:2.1.pli: Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana14.35:3.1.pli: Niyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.35:4.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana14.36:1.1.pli: Sauttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana14.36:2.1.pli: Anuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasauttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasauttaro ca naanuttaro ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana14.36:3.1.pli: Sauttarañca anuttarañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naanuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana14.36:4.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana14.37:1.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo ca naaraṇo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana14.37:2.1.pli: Araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana14.37:3.1.pli: Saraṇañca araṇañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana14.37:4.1.pli: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca.

patthana14.37:5.1.pli: Saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.

patthana14.37:6.1.pli: Araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanaaraṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.37:7.1.pli: Nahetuyā dve, na ārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā pañca …pe… napurejāte cattāri …pe… nakamme dve …pe… naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṃ …pe… navippayutte dve …pe… novigate tīṇi.

patthana14.37:8.1.pli: (Sahajātavārampi paccayavārampi nissayavārampi saṃsaṭṭhavārampi sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana14.37:9.1.pli: Saraṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Saraṇo dhammo naaraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Saraṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa ca naaraṇassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana14.37:10.1.pli: Araṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana14.37:11.1.pli: Saraṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Saraṇo dhammo naaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.37:12.1.pli: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca, anantare cattāri …pe… sahajāte pañca, aññamaññe dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane dve, kamme cattāri, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre …pe… magge cattāri, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate satta.

patthana14.37:13.1.pli: Saraṇo dhammo nasaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, sahajātapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo, pacchājātapaccayena paccayo, kammapaccayena paccayo.

patthana14.37:14.1.pli: Saraṇo dhammo naaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, sahajātapaccayena paccayo, upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.37:15.1.pli: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta …pe… nasahajāte pañca, naaññamaññe nanissaye pañca …pe… napurejāte cha …pe… nasampayutte pañca, navippayutte cattāri …pe… noavigate cattāri.

patthana14.4:1.1.pli: Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana14.4:2.1.pli: Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana14.4:3.1.pli: Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva sahetukañca sahetukañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.4:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana14.5:1.1.pli: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana14.5:2.1.pli: Hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana14.5:3.1.pli: Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu dhammo ca uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñceva hetusampayuttañca hetusampayuttañceva na ca hetuñca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nahetuvippayutto ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.5:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana14.6:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ sahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.6:2.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… purejāte āsevane dve …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana14.7:1.1.pli: Sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.7:3.1.pli: Sappaccayo dhammo naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.

patthana14.7:4.1.pli: Appaccayo dhammo naappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.7:5.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… upanissaye dve …pe… avigate ekaṃ. (Saṅkhataṃ sappaccayasadisaṃ.)

patthana14.8:1.1.pli: Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassano ca naanidassano ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.8:2.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana14.9:1.1.pli: Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasappaṭigho ca naappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana14.9:2.1.pli: Appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Appaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasappaṭigho ca naappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.

patthana14.9:3.1.pli: Sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sappaṭighañca appaṭighañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nasappaṭigho ca naappaṭigho ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana14.9:4.1.pli: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe ekaṃ …pe… aññamaññe cha …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)

patthana15.1:2.1.pli: Hetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṃ kusalañca nahetuṃ kusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi (cittasamuṭṭhānameva, ārammaṇaṃ natthi.)

patthana15.1:3.1.pli: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana15.1:5.1.pli: Hetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana15.1:6.1.pli: Hetu kusalo dhammo nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana15.1:7.1.pli: Nahetu kusalo dhammo nanahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana15.1:8.1.pli: Hetu kusalo ca nahetu kusalo ca dhammā nahetussa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana15.1:9.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare nava, sahajāte nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, pacchājāte tīṇi, kamme ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye tīṇi, jhāne ekaṃ, magge tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana15.1:10.1.pli: Hetuṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana15.1:11.1.pli: Nahetuṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

patthana15.1:12.1.pli: Hetuṃ akusalañca nahetuṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana15.1:14.1.pli: Hetu akusalo dhammo nahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana15.1:15.1.pli: Hetu akusalo dhammo nahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana15.1:16.1.pli: Nahetu akusalo dhammo nanahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana15.1:17.1.pli: Hetu akusalo ca nahetu akusalo ca dhammā nahetussa naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṃ.)

patthana15.1:18.1.pli: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekaṃ, anantare samanantare nava, sahajāte nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye nava, pacchājāte tīṇi, kamme ekaṃ, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye tīṇi, jhāne ekaṃ, magge tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana15.1:19.1.pli: Nahetuṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Nissayavārampi …pe… pañhāvārampi vitthāretabbaṃ.)

patthana15.10:1.1.pli: Hetuṃ ācayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naācayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana15.10:2.1.pli: Hetuṃ apacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naapacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana15.10:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nevācayagāmināpacayagāmiṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanahetu nanevācayagāmināpacayagāmī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana15.11:1.1.pli: Hetuṃ sekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana15.11:2.1.pli: Hetuṃ asekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana15.11:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanahetu nanevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana15.12:1.1.pli: Nahetuṃ parittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naparitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)

patthana15.12:2.1.pli: Hetuṃ mahaggataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu namahaggato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana15.12:3.1.pli: Hetuṃ appamāṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naappamāṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana15.13:1.1.pli: Hetuṃ parittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naparittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)

patthana15.13:2.1.pli: Hetuṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu namahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)

patthana15.13:3.1.pli: Hetuṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naappamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana15.14:1.1.pli: Hetuṃ hīnaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nahīno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana15.14:2.1.pli: Nahetuṃ majjhimaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanahetu namajjhimo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana15.14:3.1.pli: Hetuṃ paṇītaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu napaṇīto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana15.15:1.1.pli: Hetuṃ micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)

patthana15.15:2.1.pli: Hetuṃ sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)

patthana15.15:3.1.pli: Nahetuṃ aniyataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanahetu naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

patthana15.16:1.1.pli: Hetuṃ maggārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu namaggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)

patthana15.16:2.1.pli: Hetuṃ maggahetukaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu namaggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. (Sabbattha tīṇi.)

patthana15.16:3.1.pli: Hetuṃ maggādhipatiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu namaggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
